name: preparatory
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
done in order to get ready for something: preparatory work Differences over these issues narrowed during the preparatory meetings/talks. He discovered new chemical reactions and introduced improved preparative techniques.
More examplesFewer examplesThe exhibition brings together the artist's original drawings and preparatory sketches.More than 70% of those who completed the preparatory programme went on to find employment.Several projects are already underway and many more are in their preparatory phases.
